cause.description:
SAFA was formed in 1990 by Sue Worsham in response to the rapid increase in the number of HIV/AIDS infections in our area. Our mission is to educate the community about HIV/AIDS, help prevent the spread of the disease, and render assistance to those already stricken.
1. HIV Education
2. HIV Counseling
3. Teenage Aids Prevention Program
4. Free HIV Oral Testing
5. Food Pantry
6. Direct Services
7. Emergency Assistance
8. One Day Workshop - "AIDS, Drugs and
cause.mission: South Arkansas Fights AIDS is dedicated to providing HIV/AIDS in the southern Arkansas region
cause.name: South Arkansas Fights Aids
